ISSUE.TITLE: Rightclick-> New screenshot creates an "undefined" file and stops the device stream
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If you make a screenshot with a right click the device stops streaming the screen - although everything you do is still re-created on the device. [Screencast](http://gfycat.com/FloweryLivelyAnemoneshrimp) Edit: seems its a known issue since 2015 and already fixed in an unmerged-yet PR. Sorry :(
